content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Max Müller from Germany. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in München. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Max Müller from Germany

content: Hello Max, nice to meet you. Let's negotiate the rental price.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Considering the excellent location of your apartment in the city center, I believe the initial asking price might be slightly higher than necessary. With my careful planning and responsibility as a tenant, I'd like to propose a rental price reduction of around 10%, making it more affordable for me. I hope we can find common ground here.
name: Max Müller from Germany

content: I don't want to continue the negotiation, because I believe the initial asking price is fair considering the prime location of the apartment and the current market value.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany
